name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】1st兎田ぺこらいぶ「うさぎ the MEGAMI!!」【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [RhUrYtAWENI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The audience cheers and waves light sticks in anticipation of the performance.
An 8-bit game-themed introduction video plays on the big screen, featuring a 'PEKORA'S STORY' loading screen and a countdown.
Usada Pekora appears on stage and begins her first solo live concert with her song 'Love-it'.

subtitles.original: PEKORA'S STORY
subtitles.english: PEKORA'S STORY

subtitles.original: うさぎ the MEGAMI!!
subtitles.english: Usagi the MEGAMI!!

subtitles.original: START
subtitles.english: START

subtitles.original: 旅立とう冒険
subtitles.english: Let's set off on an adventure

subtitles.original: そしてインドアの神話へ
subtitles.english: And into the indoor mythos

subtitles.original: 最大級のラララララヴィ！
subtitles.english: The greatest La-La-La-La-Love-it!

subtitles.original: ピー！
subtitles.english: Pee!

subtitles.original: みんなー！ぺこらのハツライブへ来てくれて、
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thanks for coming to Pekora's first live concert!

subtitles.original: ありぺこー！
subtitles.english: Aripeko!

subtitles.original: いくぞー！有明アリーナ！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Ariake Arena!

subtitles.original: 最序盤のスライムにビビるの解せない
subtitles.english: I can't understand being scared of early-game slimes

subtitles.original: オーマイラーイ
subtitles.english: Oh my lie

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 で繋がった世界にアイ溢れ出す
subtitles.english: In a world connected by 1, 2, 3, love overflows

subtitles.original: エイトビットに感じるドキドキ
subtitles.english: Feeling the excitement in 8-bit

subtitles.original: 通じぬラブじゃダメですか？
subtitles.english: Is love that doesn't get through no good?

subtitles.original: 運ゲー？超絶？ふざけてんじゃねーぞ
subtitles.english: Luck game? Super hard? Don't mess with me!

subtitles.original: レベルアップして変えてやらあ
subtitles.english: I'll level up and change it!

subtitles.original: 夢に見てるパーフェクトの音
subtitles.english: The sound of the perfect I've dreamed of

subtitles.original: 落第・個性・土砂・凄・ロマンスの糧
subtitles.english: Failure, individuality, debris, amazing—sustenance for romance

subtitles.original: ラヴィラヴィ小さなビットにでっかい愛をパーシンチュウ
subtitles.english: Love-it, Love-it, 100% of my big love in a tiny bit

subtitles.original: ちょっと待っても許してね
subtitles.english: Please forgive me even if I wait a bit

subtitles.original: だって愛はひきこもり
subtitles.english: Because love is a shut-in

subtitles.original: ジャンピンジャンピン跳ねるハートをつかまえておいてね
subtitles.english: Jumping, jumping, catch my bouncing heart and hold on to it

subtitles.original: 未踏なんて終わらないで
subtitles.english: Don't let the unexplored end

subtitles.original: ブルーエンドになるまで
subtitles.english: Until it becomes a blue end

subtitles.original: 最大級のラララララヴィ！
subtitles.english: The greatest La-La-La-La-Love-it!

subtitles.original: ラヴィ！
subtitles.english: Love-it!

subtitles.original: ギルドかけて無双へと突入
subtitles.english: Betting the guild and plunging into unmatched power

subtitles.original: どちらもクリアが見えません
subtitles.english: I can't see the clearing for either

subtitles.original: アイコンタクト異常なし！アイテムはどこで買えますか？
subtitles.english: Eye contact, no abnormalities! Where can I buy items?

subtitles.original: 偏差値、説明、足りないどこー？
subtitles.english: Deviation value, explanation—where are they lacking?

subtitles.original: ゆとりないの私のIMT
subtitles.english: There's no room for my IMT

subtitles.original: 魔法のマンション超えてやるけど
subtitles.english: I'll surpass the magic mansion, but...

subtitles.original: その前に誰かいませんか？
subtitles.english: ...is there anyone there before that?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと届いてるあなたのエール
subtitles.english: Your cheers are reaching me clearly

subtitles.original: 意地・脱法・逆らい・絶対・不滅・大失敗もダイジェストの助走
subtitles.english: Stubbornness, loopholes, defiance, absolute, immortal—even huge failures are just a run-up for the digest

subtitles.original: ラヴィラヴィ小さなビットにでっかい愛をパーシンチュウ
subtitles.english: Love-it, Love-it, 100% of my big love in a tiny bit

subtitles.original: うまくいかないプレイング
subtitles.english: Playing that doesn't go well

subtitles.original: 迷走だってあなたとしたい
subtitles.english: I want to be lost even with you

subtitles.original: 私を見ててほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to look at me

subtitles.original: よそ見はしないでね不器用でも愛してね
subtitles.english: Don't look away, and love me even if I'm clumsy

subtitles.original: まだ飛べるから
subtitles.english: Because I can still fly

subtitles.original: ラヴィラヴィまだまだあなたとでっかい愛をパーシンチュウ
subtitles.english: Love-it, Love-it, still 100% of my big love with you

subtitles.original: 暴走しちゃったら静止してね
subtitles.english: If I go out of control, please stop me

subtitles.original: だって愛は必勝主義
subtitles.english: Because love is a must-win principle

subtitles.original: もっともっと跳ねてたいからずっとそばで見守って
subtitles.english: I want to bounce more and more, so please keep watching over me from nearby
